div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1496 Byblus (mod. Jebail), Phoenicia, 1931 (175, part) Burial: c. 333 B.C. (Naster) Contents: 217 AR. Pot hoard from excava- tions Byblus: st. (Adramelek 31, Azbaal 135, Ainel 35, unc. king 16) Disposition: Beirut? Durant, Fouilles de Byblos I, 1926-1932 (Paris 1937-9), pp. 407-9, nos. 6091-6307, illus. Naster, INCJ, pp. 5, 12-3 Noe combines this hd. with a later one, no. 1515 below
